name: The Trud
description:
The Trud is a first person game that seeks an atmospheric and immersive horror, the game combines exploration with stealth, you'll need to find out what's happening and find a way out of your torment while being hunted by monsters.


After passing out while running from a robber on an alley, you wake up in a very strange place, but at the same time it looks familiar. It's almost like it wasn't real. During the game you'll need find and piece together the story to find what's happening in that place, and at the same time find a way out while The Trud tries to stop you, appealing to your worst nightmares.
